titleStmt.title: Some generall directions for a comfortable walking with God deliuered in the lecture at Kettering in Northhamptonshire, with enlargement: by Robert Bolton ...
titleStmt.author: Bolton, Robert, 1572-1631.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition: corrected and amended; with a table thereunto annexed.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Edmund Weauer, and are to be sold at his shop at the great north doore of Pauls Church,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Generall directions for a comfortable walking with God.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the great north doore of Pauls Church
